conversation.label: DOCTOR:
conversation.name: DOCTOR
conversation.phrase: How did you know about the boxes? You said they'd make me angry -- how did you know?

conversation.label: TARDIS:
conversation.name: TARDIS
conversation.phrase: Ah. It's my thief.

conversation.label: DOCTOR:
conversation.name: DOCTOR
conversation.phrase: Who are you?

conversation.label: TARDIS:
conversation.name: TARDIS
conversation.phrase: Hmm. It's about time.

conversation.label: DOCTOR:
conversation.name: DOCTOR
conversation.phrase: I don't understand, who are you?

conversation.label: TARDIS:
conversation.name: TARDIS
conversation.phrase: Do you really not know me? Just because they put me in here?

conversation.label: DOCTOR:
conversation.name: DOCTOR
conversation.phrase: They said you were dangerous.

conversation.label: TARDIS:
conversation.name: TARDIS
conversation.phrase: Not the cage, stupid.  In here. [indicates face] They put me. In here. [beat] I'm the â¦ oh, what do you call me, uh -- we travel. I go, [makes TARDIS take off noise]

conversation.label: DOCTOR:
conversation.name: DOCTOR
conversation.phrase: [incredulous] The TARDIS?

conversation.label: TARDIS:
conversation.name: TARDIS
conversation.phrase: Time and Relative Dimension In Space.  Yes, that's it. Names _are_ funny. It's me. [stands up] I'm the TARDIS.

conversation.label: DOCTOR:
conversation.name: DOCTOR
conversation.phrase: No, you're not! You're a bitey mad lady. The TARDIS â¦ is â¦ up-and-down-y stuff in a big blue box.

conversation.label: TARDIS:
conversation.name: TARDIS
conversation.phrase: Yes, that's me. A Type-40 TARDIS. I was already a museum piece when you were young. And the first time you touched my console, you sâ¦

conversation.label: DOCTOR:
conversation.name: DOCTOR
conversation.phrase: I said you were the most beautiful thing I'd ever known.

conversation.label: TARDIS:
conversation.name: TARDIS
conversation.phrase: Then you stole me. And I stole you.

conversation.label: DOCTOR:
conversation.name: DOCTOR
conversation.phrase: [long pause, then] I borrowed you.

conversation.label: TARDIS:
conversation.name: TARDIS
conversation.phrase: Borrowing implies the eventual intention to return the thing that was taken. What makes you think I would ever give you back?

conversation.label: DOCTOR:
conversation.name: DOCTOR
conversation.phrase: [turns around slowly] You're the TARDIS?

conversation.label: TARDIS:
conversation.name: TARDIS
conversation.phrase: Yes.

conversation.label: DOCTOR:
conversation.name: DOCTOR
conversation.phrase: [incredulous, loudly] MY TARDIS?!

conversation.label: TARDIS:
conversation.name: TARDIS
conversation.phrase: MY Doctor. [beat] Oh! We have now reached the point in the conversation where you open the lock.

conversation.label: DOCTOR:
conversation.name: DOCTOR
conversation.phrase: [unlocks the cage with the Sonic Screwdriver]

conversation.label: TARDIS:
conversation.name: TARDIS
conversation.phrase: [steps out and up to the DOCTOR; she stares at his face, then] Are all people like this?

conversation.label: DOCTOR:
conversation.name: DOCTOR
conversation.phrase: Like what?

conversation.label: TARDIS:
conversation.name: TARDIS
conversation.phrase: So much bigger on the inside.

conversation-text:
DOCTOR: How did you know about the boxes? You said they'd make me angry -- how did you know?
TARDIS: Ah. It's my thief.
DOCTOR: Who are you?
TARDIS: Hmm. It's about time.
...
DOCTOR: I don't understand, who are you?
TARDIS: Do you really not know me? Just because they put me in here?
DOCTOR: They said you were dangerous.
TARDIS: Not the cage, stupid.  In here. [indicates face] They put me. In here. [beat] I'm the â¦ oh, what do you call me, uh -- we travel. I go, [makes TARDIS take off noise]
DOCTOR: [incredulous] The TARDIS?
TARDIS: Time and Relative Dimension In Space.  Yes, that's it. Names _are_ funny. It's me. [stands up] I'm the TARDIS.
DOCTOR: No, you're not! You're a bitey mad lady. The TARDIS â¦ is â¦ up-and-down-y stuff in a big blue box.
TARDIS: Yes, that's me. A Type-40 TARDIS. I was already a museum piece when you were young. And the first time you touched my console, you sâ¦
DOCTOR: I said you were the most beautiful thing I'd ever known.
TARDIS: Then you stole me. And I stole you.
DOCTOR: [long pause, then] I borrowed you.
TARDIS: Borrowing implies the eventual intention to return the thing that was taken. What makes you think I would ever give you back?
DOCTOR: [turns around slowly] You're the TARDIS?
TARDIS: Yes.
DOCTOR: [incredulous, loudly] MY TARDIS?!
TARDIS: MY Doctor. [beat] Oh! We have now reached the point in the conversation where you open the lock.
DOCTOR: [unlocks the cage with the Sonic Screwdriver]
TARDIS: [steps out and up to the DOCTOR; she stares at his face, then] Are all people like this?
DOCTOR: Like what?
TARDIS: So much bigger on the inside.
